subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] Hi guys i'm new here and had a few questions.
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
I was trying to do a quick search on line, but couldn't find it. I have some 
infromation at home I can put up. I have an article from a 1995 Popular 
Electronics on EVP that explains the diode method. Welcome to the group BTW.

The Spiricom is kinda complicated, and I've heard that no one has been able 
to get it to work. I do have another method where I randomly tune a radio, 
and use the resulting random audio as a source of raw audio which the 
spirits can use to form their voices. It kinda complicated, but I have 
schematics on line at http://franksumption.tripod.com on the system 
information page. You almost have to have a scope to be able to get it to 
work though, curiously, no one seems to be able to get my circuits to work 
either, altough others can use the "boxes".

There are some methods that require very little equipment, one is EVPmaker, 
that runs on a computer, and is freeware. 
http://www.stefanbion.de/evpmaker/index_e.htm

Another is using a foreign lanuge form shortwave, and just announce you're 
doing an EVP recording, and rtecord the shortwave station open air, wiht the 
recorder set up near the radio. On playback there should be phrases, and 
messages in English.

Frank
